FuncDef:
The local-bill backup-interval command sets an interval for automatic local bill transfer from the local bill pool or CF card to a bill server.
The undo local-bill backup-interval command restores the default interval.
By default, the interval for automatic local bill transfer is 1440 minutes.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets an interval for automatic local bill transfer from the local bill pool or CF card to a bill server.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 65535, in minutes.

ExtraInfo:
Due to the limited capacity of the local bill pool or CF card, newly generated local bills will be discarded when the local bill pool or CF card is fully occupied. To resolve this issue, run the local-bill backup-interval command to set an interval for automatic local bill transfer from the local bill pool or CF card to a bill server.
Set the interval based on the actual service or user volume.
